hydra.langs.json

Class JsonDecoding

  • java.lang.Object
    • hydra.langs.json.JsonDecoding

  • public abstract class JsonDecoding
extends java.lang.Object
    Decoding functions for Hydra's native JSON values which are intended for use in Java. Decoding failures result in Java exceptions rather than failure flows.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JsonDecoding()
